name: upwork-job-scraper
description: A Chrome extension (MV3) that automatically scrapes Upwork job listings from a saved search URL and delivers new results via browser notifications and/or a webhook.

scripts.verify:version: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json').version; const man=require('./.output/chrome-mv3/manifest.json').version; if(pkg!==man){console.error('Version mismatch: package.json='+pkg+' manifest='+man); process.exit(1)} console.log('Version OK: '+pkg)"
